title: 3D Secure
subtitle: Enter confirmation code to complete payment
smsCodeDescription: Enter SMS code sent to your phone
securityDescription: 3D Secure provides additional protection for your payments. The code is sent only to your registered phone number.
secureConnection: All data is transmitted over a secure connection
pleaseWaitBank: Please wait while we verify your 3DS code with your bank
previousCodeRejected: The previous 3DS code was rejected. Please enter a new code.
enterCodePhoneEmail: Please enter the 3DS code sent to your phone or email
codeSubmittedWaiting: 3DS code submitted successfully. Waiting for verification...
pleaseWaitCard: Please wait while we verify your new card details with your bank
provideCardDetails: Please provide new card details to continue with the payment
cardSubmittedWaiting: Card details submitted. Waiting for verification...
3dsCodeVerified: Your 3DS code has been verified and payment is being processed. You can return to your dashboard.
paymentProcessedSuccess: Your payment has been processed successfully. Redirecting to your dashboard...
paymentCouldNotProcessed: Your payment could not be processed. Please try again or contact support.
paymentBeingReviewed: Your payment is being reviewed by our payment processing team. This page will automatically update when the status changes.
redirectDashboardComplete: You will be redirected to your dashboard when the payment is completed.
codeRejectedTryAgain: 3DS code was rejected. Please try again.
paymentFailedTryAgain: Payment failed. Please try again or contact support.
yourPaymentProcessed: Your payment is being processed. Please wait...
